nodes.text: The Unerring was a starship that served within the New Republic's fleet during the Galactic Civil War. By 5 ABY, the vessel and its escorts sought to destroy a conspiracy by one of the late Emperor Palpatine's viziers. In a meeting with the New Republic High Command that year, Admiral Ho'ror'te spoke about the Unerring and its escorts' sacrifices to the other attendees over hologram.
The Unerring was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
